name: Watch Catch
description:
Watch Catch is a new generation shooter game for Apple Watch. It is specifically designed to get you addicted to your Apple Watch.

You will have 301 levels with gradually increasing difficulty. Do not give up and complete all to show the best!

Platform is moving to challenge you; be patient, get ready and use the crown!

You need an Apple Watch to play Watch Catch. We support since WatchOS 5.( You dont need an iPhone)


FEATURES

* The best shooting game for Apple Watch.

* Exactly 301 unique levels.

* Easy and fun gameplay.

* Awesome design with multiple options.

* Pay once and play forever!

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME
* You are a free shooter only with two concerns: Obstacles and Time.
* Try not to target the obstacles.
* You have certain number of bullets to get rid of in the given time period.
